about: During the Bootcamp training I designed a user interface from frontend mentor challenge code using html and vanilla css.Blow is the link to the interface.

While interning at ZedOne, I worked with the team to build their front-end product.This helped improve my knowledge by contributing  to the growth and development of the organisation.I created a user interface with a home page and forms to help companies and users register and login, this was done with Reactjs and TailwindCSS.
